title: Licensed Clinical Social Worker - Part time
status: Part Time, .5  FTE ( 20 hours per week)Minimum Requirements:Master's Degree in Social Work from an accredited university/college program.A valid Utah School Social Worker (K-12) License or A valid Utah DOPL Licensed Clinical Social Worker License AND be eligible to obtain a Utah School Social Worker (K-12) License within one school year.An active Utah Driver’s License is required.Board Certified Behavioral Analysis (BCBA) or Equivalent Experience or Certification preferred.The salary for this position is assigned to the lane 5 of the ES Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkES Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):Licensed Clinical Social Worker.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
